nodes.name: Request to get the gift card PDF version

parameters.url: ={{ $('Request to get the gift card PDF version').item.json.job.urls[0] }}

parameters.subject: =Dear {{ $('Filter only non processed').item.json['Recipient name (To)'].split(' ')[0]  }}, {{ $('Filter only non processed').item.json['Your name (From)']}} sent you this Gift Card for your own Angel Canvas
parameters.message:
=The Angel Canvas has provided many current and aspiring Angel Investors the tools to succeed and avoid costly mistakes.

We are confident it’ll help you too.

Check it out. https://tally.so/r/n9MY2V

parameters.textBody: To create your gift card just type: "Create gift card"
Got it. What’s the name of the person you want to gift it to?

Hi, I will help you create your own Angel Canvas Gift Card, like this one. 

Tell me your first and last name.
Ok, I'm creating it. Hold on 20 sec.

parameters.textBody:
There you go. Now you just need to forward it.

Want another one? Just type their first and last name.

---

=Hi {{ $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body.split(' ')[0]  }}, I found this tool and it was very insightful to better understand my angel profile and plan my angel investing strategy.

I think you will like it too.

https://tally.so/r/n9MY2V
